name: NSQIP_OPERATIVE_APPROACH
description: The NSQIP_OPERATIVE_APPROACH table contains the discrete operative approach categorizations. The information is part of NSQIP registry submissions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NSQIP_OPER_APPROACH_C_NAME
columns.description: This item captures the technique used to reach the site of the surgical procedure.
